# leastwood

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

I'm an independent security researcher focused primarily on EVM security. Most
of my time is spent as a Lead Security Researcher at
[Spearbit](https://spearbit.com/), but I like to dabble in other smart
contract stacks.

## Highlights

  * Worked as a Sigma Prime security engineer

Previously worked with Sigma Prime as a security engineer for 2 years.

  * Interview with Andy Li

In early 2023, I had the opportunity to talk to Andy about web3 security and
smart contract auditing.

  * Paradigm Fellow

Currently a member of the Paradigm fellowship program.

  * Rank #3 all-time on Code4rena

At the time of writing, currently ranked at the #3 spot all-time on the
Code4rena leaderboard.

  * Placed 11th in Paradigm CTF

Competed in the Paradigm CTF under SpearbitVanguard and ranked #11 overall.

## leastwood's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=leastwood&source=leastwood-profile)

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/0xleastwood?lang=en)
  * [Telegram](https://telegram.me/leastwood)
  * [Website](https://www.leastwood.xyz/)
